expansioncontent:GuardianWhirl.NAME: Guardian Whirl
expansioncontent:GuardianWhirl.DESCRIPTION: expansioncontent:Boss - Guardian. NL Requires 10 or more Block. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies 4 times. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I do not have enough Block.

expansioncontent:Hexaburn.NAME: Hexaburn
expansioncontent:Hexaburn.DESCRIPTION: expansioncontent:Boss - Hexaghost. NL In !M! turns, deal 6 damage to a random enemy 6 times.

expansioncontent:InvincibleStrength.NAME: Invincible
expansioncontent:InvincibleStrength.DESCRIPTION: expansioncontent:Boss - Corrupt Heart. NL Gain 10 expansioncontent:Invincible. NL If you already had expansioncontent:Invincible, it lasts another turn instead.

expansioncontent:HyperBeam.NAME: Automa-Beam
expansioncontent:HyperBeam.DESCRIPTION: expansioncontent:Boss - Automaton. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL At the start of your next turn, lose [E]. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:LastStand.NAME: Last Stand
expansioncontent:LastStand.DESCRIPTION: expansioncontent:Boss - Champ. NL Remove all Debuffs. NL Gain 1 Strength. NL If you are below half HP, Gain 2 Strength.
expansioncontent:LastStand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: expansioncontent:Boss - Champ. NL Remove all Debuffs. NL Gain 1 Strength. NL If you are below half HP, Heal !M! and gain 2 Strength.

expansioncontent:YouAreMine.NAME: YOU ARE MINE!
expansioncontent:YouAreMine.DESCRIPTION: expansioncontent:Boss - Collector. NL Remove ALL enemy Block. NL Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:AwakenDeath.NAME: Awaken
expansioncontent:AwakenDeath.DESCRIPTION: expansioncontent:Boss - Awakened One. NL Gain 1 Strength. NL When you would die, heal !M! HP instead.

expansioncontent:Chronoboost.NAME: Chrono-Boost
expansioncontent:Chronoboost.DESCRIPTION: expansioncontent:Boss - Time Eater. NL Gain 1 Strength for every 12th card you play.
expansioncontent:Chronoboost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: expansioncontent:Boss - Time Eater. NL Gain 1 Strength. NL Gain 1 Strength for every 12th card you play.

expansioncontent:PolyBeam.NAME: Donu Blast
expansioncontent:PolyBeam.DESCRIPTION: expansioncontent:Boss - Ancients. NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL Next turn, add a *Deca *Shield into your hand. NL Exhaust.
expansioncontent:PolyBeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: expansioncontent:Boss - Ancients. NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL Next turn, add a *Deca *Shield+ into your hand. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:DecaShield.NAME: Deca Shield
expansioncontent:DecaShield.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL expansioncontent:Boss - Ancients. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, add a *Donu *Blast with Ethereal into your hand. NL Exhaust.
expansioncontent:DecaShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL expansioncontent:Boss - Ancients. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, add a *Donu *Blast+ with Ethereal into your hand. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:PrepareCrush.NAME: Prepare Crush
expansioncontent:PrepareCrush.DESCRIPTION: expansioncontent:Boss - Slime. NL Gain !B! Block. NL On your next turn, gain [E] [E] [E] and add SLIME CRUSH to your hand. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:StudyTheSpire.NAME: Study the Spire
expansioncontent:StudyTheSpire.DESCRIPTION: Add a random expansioncontent:Boss card to your hand at the start of your next !M! turns. They cost 0 until played.
expansioncontent:StudyTheSpire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Upgraded expansioncontent:Boss card to your hand at the start of your next !M! turns. They cost 0 until played.

expansioncontent:QuickStudy.NAME: Quick Study
expansioncontent:QuickStudy.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 expansioncontent:Boss cards. NL Add it into your hand. NL It costs 0 until played. NL Exhaust.
expansioncontent:QuickStudy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 Upgraded expansioncontent:Boss cards. NL Add it into your hand. NL It costs 0 until played. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:DashGenerateEvil.NAME: The Evil Within
expansioncontent:DashGenerateEvil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Add a random expansioncontent:Boss card to your hand. It costs 0 until played. NL Exhaust.
expansioncontent:DashGenerateEvil.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Add a random Upgraded expansioncontent:Boss card to your hand. It costs 0 until played. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:KnowingSkullWish.NAME: Knowing Skull
expansioncontent:KnowingSkullWish.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Spend HP to Wish for Souls, Success, or a Pick Me Up. NL Exhaust.
